thread.title: A great hotel in central London
thread.title_full: A great hotel in central London - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: zzz49
title: A great hotel in central London
text: I just returned from a week in London on business and I recommend The Nadler Victoria for business and couples. The location is perfect--a couple of blocks from Victoria Station with so much of what London has to offer at the hotel's doorstep. The rooms are clean and well-appointed. Everything works. Our bed was comfortable. The bathroom is spacious with a large shower. We put the efficiency kitchen to good use for tea, coffee, and breakfast. (There's a Waitrose for provisions a block away.) Best of all is the staff. They are super friendly without being intrusive. They are responsive. They made our stay at the hotel lovely. All in all, a nice visit. I'll be back.
